comments.body: I believe this supposed to be `const domtagger = require('domtagger');`, but I also know nothing about TS ðŸ˜…

**TypeScript** uses [`importÂ domtaggerÂ =Â require('domtagger');`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/modules.html#export--and-import--require), which gets transpiled to `constÂ domtaggerÂ =Â require('domtagger');`.

Using `constÂ domtaggerÂ =Â require('domtagger');` would infer the type of `domtagger` as `any`, and cause a build failure without a type definition for `require`.

---
